The DoE flextable theme

Source: R/themes-flextable.R
theme_doe_flextable.Rd

Apply a DoE brand-compliant theme to a flextable object.

Usage

theme_doe_flextable(x)

apply_DoE_zebra_format(x)

Arguments

x

a flextable object

Examples

head(mtcars) |>
  flextable::flextable() |>
  theme_doe_flextable()
